extendedInfo.description: Aadhaar is a 12 digit individual identification number issued by the Unique Identification Authority of India on behalf of the Government of India. The UIDAI's mandate is to issue every resident a unique identification number linked to the resident's demographic and biometric information, which they can use to identify themselves anywhere in India, and to access a host of benefits and services. Each Aadhaar number will be unique to an individual and will remain valid for life. Aadhaar number will help you provide access to services like banking, mobile phone connections and other Govt and Non-Govt services in due course. CreaveLabs Web Solutions presents an Aadhaar Card Reader, which keeps your Aadhaar details with you anywhere anytime. Scan your Aadhaar card and save your details to your mobile device. No need to take the risk of carrying such a very important document along with you.  You can group the Aadhaar cards of your family, friends and whatever groups you want to create. You can also send your Aadhaar details to other devices using the app. Still waiting for your Aadhaar Card? you can now check its status with this app!Now, be powerful with 'privileges in hand'. A must have app for every Indian Android Users!!This is still a BETA version, updates are on the way with more features like contact save, grouping of cards etc.. Join the discussion group https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/aadhaarcardreader to add your suggestions and comments..Join us at Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/AadhaarCardReaderHappy scanning!! :)Keywords: aadhaar, adhar, aadhar, adhaar, aathaar, aathar, aadaar, aadar, indian unique id, aadhaar status check
